Twilight Halfling: Has the Low-Light Vision feature
Adopted Ancestry (Human): Can take Human ancestry feats
Guiding Luck: (F) Rerolls a failed Perception check or attack roll once per day
Halfling Luck: (F) Rerolls a failed skill check or save once per day
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light

Skill Notes:
Fighter Skills: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from Acrobatics, Athletics; Choose 3 from any)
Halfling Lore: Skill Trained (Acrobatics; Stealth; Halfling Lore)
Nomadic Halfling: +2 Language Count
Ceaseless Shadows: Can use Hide and Sneak without cover and gains 1 degree better cover from larger creatures
Distracting Shadows: Can use larger creatures as cover for Hide and Sneak
Keen Eyes: R30' +2 Seek to find hidden creatures
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Sure Feet: Successes on Acrobatics to Balance and Athletics to Climb are critical successes/Does not suffer flat-footed during Balance or Climb
Watchful Halfling: +2 Sense Motive to notice enchantment or possession, and automatically attempts a -2 check to notice these
Combat
Hit Points: 16 Armor Class: 17 (dexterity; trained) Class DC: Fighter: 17 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Filcher's Fork (+9 1d4 P [Crit +d6] R20'; dexterity; expert); Halfling Sling Staff (+9 1d10 B R80'; dexterity; expert); Sawtooth Saber (+7 1d6 S; dexterity; trained); Shortsword (+9 1d6 P/S; dexterity; expert); Sling (+9 1d6 B R50'; dexterity; expert)
Combat Notes:
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Halfling Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Sling; Halfling Sling Staff; Shortsword; Halfling Weapons)
Halfling Weapon Familiarity: Attack Trained (Sling; Halfling Sling Staff; Shortsword)/Weapon Familiarity (Halfling Weapons)
Attack Of Opportunity: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Halfling Weapon Familiarity: Has access to uncommon halfling weapons
Halfling Weapon Trickster: Critical hits with a shortsword, sling, or halfling weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Hillock Halfling: Regains +1 Hit Points from treatment and overnight rest
Keen Eyes: Reduces the flat check DC to target a concealed or hidden foe to 3 or 9
Point-Blank Shot: (1) Stance negates volley penalty from a ranged volley weapon and gives +2 HP damage within the first range increment of a ranged non-volley weapon
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Titan Slinger: Slings inflict +1 damage die step vs. Large and larger targets
Unfettered Halfling: Successes to Escape and vs. grabbed or restrained are critical successes/Foe Grapple fails are critical fails/Foe Grab requires a successful Athletics check
Save: Fortitude: +5 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +9 (dexterity; expert); Will: +6 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Gutsy Halfling: Successful saves vs. emotion are critical successes
Irrepressible: Successful saves vs. emotion are critical successes, and critical failures vs. emotion are normal failures
Watchful Halfling: Can use Aid to help another overcome enchantment or possession
Notes
Validation Errors:
Ancestry Feats Allocation: 2 available vs. 14 allocated
Ceaseless Shadows Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 13 and distracting shadows feature (currently 1)
Cultural Adaptability (Human) Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 5
Guiding Luck Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 9 and halfling luck feature (currently 1)
Halfling Heritage Allocation: 1 available vs. 5 allocated
Halfling Weapon Expertise Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 13 and halfling weapon familiarity feature (currently 1)
Halfling Weapon Trickster Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 5 and halfling weapon familiarity feature (currently 1)
Irrepressible Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 9
